value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. value.title: Extract Parts of a Text Value in Power BI using a Delimiter Power Query Transformation
